body.p: The Monitor PCB has an Ethernet port and cable. The Ethernet cable hangs down from the Monitor with a an RJ45 jack connection that is close to the Contractor Board.

Use the Settings screen to set Ethernet parameters (). The Ethernet connection allows you to run TCP/IP, Modbus TCP/IP, HTTP for the web server, SNMP, SNTP for time synchronization, and SMTP for email summary alarm alerts. describes configuration for these options.
